descriptionHtml:
Please Endorse mods you like! If you're using it, that means, you like it..

Author:
    Squall

Description:
    Adds to the game Souldrinker from Dark Messiah.
    I lack the required skills to make it high quality.
    If you want it enchanted with Absorb Health, please let me know!
    
Installation:
    Always make a save copy before using any mods!
    Extract Data folder to your Game DIR and enable "Souldrinker.esp" plugin.
    
Uninstallation:
    Delete Souldrinker.esp file from Game DIR/data.
    Delete Souldrinker folder from Game DIR/data/meshes/weapons.
    Delete Souldrinker folder from Game DIR/data/textures/weapons.

Crafting requirements:
    Daedric Smithing Perk    
    Ebony Ingot x2
    Daedra Heart
    Fire Salt (Original Souldrinker)
    Void Salt (Dark version)
    
Tempering requirements:    
    Arcane Blacksmith Perk    
    Ebony Ingot
author: Squall
